Compatible with iOS 9

Have you ever been listening to music through headphones, but the volume buttons adjust the volume by too much? Sometimes you want it right in between. Maybe instead of opening the Control Centre and fiddling with the tiny slider, there was an easier solution.

SmallVolumeStep allows you to set a custom number of volume levels for more precise volume selection.
Configure options from Settings.
Added an option to only customize volume increments when headphones are plugged in
